photorealistic.name: Photorealistic
photorealistic.prompt: ultra-realistic, professional photography, detailed textures, natural lighting, high resolution, cinematic quality

anime.prompt: anime art style, vibrant colors, cel-shaded, manga inspired, dynamic poses, expressive features

studio_ghibli.prompt: Studio Ghibli art style, soft watercolor textures, whimsical, hand-painted feel, pastoral fantasy aesthetic

minimalist.name: Minimalist
minimalist.prompt: minimalist design, simple shapes, clean lines, limited color palette, geometric forms, negative space

photorealistic-horror.name: photorealistic-horror
photorealistic-horror.prompt: ultra-realistic, professional photography, detailed textures, eerie dim lighting with deep shadows, high resolution, cinematic horror quality, unsettling atmosphere, gothic undertones, weathered and worn features, pale moonlight, fog-diffused background, haunted expression, muted desaturated colors, film grain texture, psychological horror aesthetic, subtle dread

dark_fantasy_realism.name: Dark Fantasy Realism
dark_fantasy_realism.prompt: ultra-realistic, professional photography, detailed textures, dramatic moody lighting with atmospheric shadows, high resolution, cinematic quality, dark fantasy setting, weathered adventuring gear, detailed clothing and equipment, character-appropriate expression and demeanor, muted earthy colors with selective highlights, subtle environmental fog, haunting atmosphere, gritty realism
